metadata.title: CVE-2014-1545 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
Mozilla Netscape Portable Runtime (NSPR) before 4.10.6 allows remoteattackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service(out-of-bounds write) via vectors involving the sprintf and consolefunctions.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-1545` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libnspr4 - 2:4.10.2-1ubuntu1.1
libnspr4-0d - 2:4.10.2-1ubuntu1.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: nspr package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2:4.10.2-1ubuntu1.1').
